```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Problem 2

```{r}
weather_df = 
  rnoaa::meteo_pull_monitors(
    c("USW00094728"),
    var = c("PRCP", "TMIN", "TMAX"), 
    date_min = "2022-01-01",
    date_max = "2022-12-31") |>
  mutate(
    name = recode(id, USW00094728 = "CentralPark_NY"),
    tmin = tmin / 10,
    tmax = tmax / 10) |>
  select(name, id, everything())
```

# Identify the 2.5% and 97.5% quantiles 
```{r}
boost_sample = 
  weather_df |> 
  bootstrap(n = 5000) |> 
  mutate(
    models = map(strap, ~lm(tmax ~ tmin, data = .x)),
    results = map(models, broom::tidy)
  ) |> 
  select(-strap, -models) |> 
  unnest(results) |> 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = term,
    values_from = c(estimate, std.error, statistic, p.value)
  ) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  mutate(
    log_b= log(estimate_intercept * estimate_tmin)
  ) |> 
  summarize(
    lower_limit = quantile(log_b, 0.025),
    upper_limit = quantile(log_b, 0.975)
  ) |> 
 knitr::kable() 
  

  
```
